content.detailedDescription: I was in the hospital and looked out of my window and saw a bright light go over hospital then just hovered over the town. so i took my android phone and took some pictures. then i opened the pictures up and saw two something inside. they are so clear you can almost see the color of their eyes and skin. for some reason i  can't attach the photos i took. they are in my photos. please advice how to send these are not. a fake. there is a lot more pictures i took that i know you would be interested in. these things didn't happen till around midnight and sun up. this is the gods truth. it happens every night still.
content.summary: Two figures inside of some sort of craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside relaxing when​ i looked up and saw a bright light crossing slowly from sorta north to a southern direction i think. it looked bigger and slow moving than a satellite i think. but not sure...
thought i would report it see what you find out for me. thanks
content.summary: Bright light crossing sky slowly from north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was cleaning up the car port area in the front of my house on wednesday september 27th, 2017 around 6:45pm in seattle, wa. this is the time of evening when a large amount of crows fly over on their way to roost, so when i heard them, i looked up.  i noticed a square object with a dome shape hanging underneath it. it was all one color which was a whitish-pink, but i believe this color was due to the evening sky and it was actually reflecting these colors. i didn't really comprehend what i was looking at and for a moment it was as if time slowed down as my brain tried searching for a way to explain it. by the time i grabbed my camera and looked up again it had significantly travelled further away. there was no noise heard during the entire sighting. i tried focusing on it while i was recording it but before i could, it seemed to dissolve or become absorbed by the colors in the sky. i managed to get a quick video and i zoomed in to grab a still shot the best i could. i am reporting this here because when i searched the internet for "ufos over seattle" after seeing this, the first thing that came up was a report from this site with images that nearly match what i saw, but the report was from june of 2016 (case 77300).

the attached media includes a video - the object is small as it is further away and in the lower part of the screen. i've also included a slowed down version as well. there are also two images that a still shots of the video zoomed in and the light darkened a bit to see it better.
content.summary: A white/pink square object with dome underneath hovered and then drifted silent until it dissolved

content.detailedDescription: Vancouver, washington october 1st 2017 8pm ..... me and my room mate went outside to potty the dogs i noticed a couple planes and then started to notice that some were blinking diffrently and that some had become still and didn't move for a good time then noticed star like objects moving there was way to many of them to be planes. one of the star ones was moving really fast took a hard left and vanished there was a least 18 of them 6 of them were star like and the other's looked kinda like planes but was definitely not planes there was at one point 7 in the sky at once .....Then more just kept popping up there not usually this much air traffic and especially that many at once .I was in awe struck by all of em and kinda worried why there was so many.
content.summary: Multiple sightings all different definitely not a plane some vanished some popped up out of no were

content.detailedDescription: While playing corn hole at a fish fry, we had taken a picture of some of the people playing.  when we were looking at the pictures later, we zoomed in on a weird blue light in the sky.  it was definitely a blue domed saucer!   no one at the party had noticed anything, only becoming aware of the light an hour or 2 after taking the picture.
content.summary: We had taken a picture, there was a blue light in the background.  upon zooming in, you can see a domed saucer.

content.detailedDescription: Was standing on back porch smoking a cigarette and staring up at the stars like usual. noticed a triangle shaped constellation at about the 3 o clock position away from the moon. i though that's a bright triangle, then the next thing i know i see a light manifest inside the middle of the triangle and head northwest. i yell for my wife when a second light formed in the triangle and began the exact same flight path. my wife came out and we both stared in disbelief at what we were seeing. we watched then head maybe 50 miles northwest in less than 1 minute. at that time the lights both seemed to stop moving and just, go out. we both stood in disbelief of what we saw and kept saying "what did we just see, what the hell was that?"
content.summary: Lights appeared, then traveled good distance then disappeared with no trace

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at a jet flying by to my left side and saw a flicker of light to my center that was a bit lower than the jet. i then observed a white sphere shaped object moving around the sky in multiple directions, maneuvering at extremely high rates of speed. the object then flew towards the jet and disappeared before it crossed it's path.
content.summary: I was looking at a jet flying by to my left side and saw a flicker of light to my center that was a bit lower than the jet. i then observed a white sphere shaped object moving around the sky in multiple directions, maneuvering at extremely high rates

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on the 700 block of sand piper st in salem oregon when i heard a propeller engine noise. i looked up but didn't see an airplane. my attention was then drawn to an object that was passing overhead. it was white in color and appeared to be a solid object. i was traveling slightly faster than an airliner. as i watched i realized the object was triangular shaped. i watched it for maybe 15 seconds when it suddenly just disappeared. at first i thought it had passed into a cloud but it didn't disappear like it had. it just vanished. i looked further along its path to see if it reappeared but it didn't.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object that disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't witness this myself as i am submitting this for a friend.

he and his father were hunting in a remote area of northern canada. they had a hunter's camera set up for assessing game.
the camera is motion actuated and takes three pictures a minute when it detects movement.

the camera took the pictures of the strange lights in the night. please note that the am and pm settings were reversed by the owner when setting time; however it is obvious wether it's day or night :-). also the date setting is 3 days behind.

i have included the images taken before and after the lights sequence. you can see that the lights are situated in the sky portion of the image, and that the landscape has not moved so there was no camera movement - that would rule out traces made by the moon on a moving camera. the camera was affixed to a post. the light were sufficiently bright to illuminate trees in the landscape, and we can see that the trees are not moving so there was no camera movement in the night sequence as well. i have no information wether it was a full moon or not.

although they didn't witness the object, the father did see a bright light in the night when he momentarily woke up during the night. another unrelated person who was in the area that week end also reported seeing a bright light in the sky.

here's coordinates of the area where the pictures were taken:
50.2437187,-71.023278

although i do believe we are not alone in the universe, as it is a statistical impossibility, i must admit personnaly i am a bit squeptical about ufo sightings. however in that case i fail to have an explication for these light traces. i don't believe a firefly could have made these. perhaps you have already seen similar things and have an explanation, so what do you make of this?

thanks,
joris in quebec, canada
content.summary: Hovering light

content.detailedDescription:
*to say i kept this a secret for a long time, aright here we go* i was a young child, going through a tough time being bullyed called names and such, some children go through but mine was worse, anyway to report,
when i went bed, in my dreams i saw a being that was tall than a normal human but i wasn't scared when "it" approach me it didn't move it legs 
when "it" got closer, i saw what it was wearing robes with symbols and big mask there were symbols where the cheeks should be the symbols depicted what i only assume was humans on the left and earth on right of the mask 
it spoke to me it said "child do not be afraid my intention are peaceful" it voice was that of a female and it echo inside my dream i didn't bother to say anything i just stared at symbols, curious of what they mean "it" said "child you do not fear me why is that?" it ask me, i answer by saying "this isn't the first time seeing strange things" i replied "it" tilted it head then it said "child do you want to learn and see the truth that your leaders had hidden from you" after "she" said that i was thinking then i said "yes i want to see the truth" i said a arm revealed it self under the robes and place it aganist my fore head, a rush full of unkown energy went to my head and that when i saw everything that our leaders has hid us from 
then i woke up having a worst possible headache, after finishing a other day of suffering i laid down my bed fell asleep i found my self in a different area than i saw "her" standing alone watching the view then she turn her head towards my direction "are you ready to learn child?" 'she' said, after those few days "she" tought me her langue and different aspects of life and such they were different then our understanding of them, before "she" left me she told me "child the path that all of humanity is going is not only going be end of your species but others as well, you must spread the message i am giving you" she said i nod "we have watch your species live, for a long  time and see no improvements your species will die like the others in the galaxy that have failed, if you do not change then your species will be one of them" she said i said "i will teacher" she said "i am not your teacher anymore, it is your turn to be the teacher and humanity is your students child" i smiled and nod though in my head there are being that we connot see but they can see us in this realitie defy our understanding of phsyics and logic anyway, she look at me and said "child i will be leaving you but you must spread the message i have giving you" i nod sadly she was leaving me after the things she tought me but she told me forgiveness was key, and so that day forward i kept it a secret for a long time and i must do it now cause war might break lose and maybe i'll find my peace for not sharing this.
content.summary: There weren't

content.detailedDescription: Was at college that afternoon doing training on a wind turbine outside. one of my classmates was laying down in the grass when he spotted the "orb" like object in the sky. our whole class looked up and seen this white object hovering in the sky. one of our class mates said they had spotted the same object in the same spot around lunch time. it was 2:20 in the afternoon at this time and it was still there. at first we thought maybe it was a weather balloon. but the object was not moving at all. we even lined it up with the side of a building to monitor its movements but it did not move at all! keep in my it was a warm summer day with a decent breeze and this was in iowa. iowa is flat and windy almost everyday. thats why we are 2nd in the nation for wind turbines. our training lasted 2 hours and the object stayed in the same place that whole time, but on the way back in we looked for it and it mysteriously disappeared from the sky. no where to be found. i have never seen anything like this in my life. two days later on facebook i seen a post from a "i grew up in iowa" page with pictures and the same description of the object we had seen but this was the next day.
content.summary: White circle "hovering" in same spot for hours. observed by college students and instructors

content.detailedDescription: Bright stationary white (star like (double the brightness of saturn))light observed for seconds, then disappeared. estimated to be slightly southeast of the palm springs tram peak (mt san jacinto) and above indian canyons. witnesses with another person. most definitely not a meteor/shooting star as there was no movement.
content.summary: Bright stationary light observed for seconds, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west exiting an old iron tressele bridge noticed a series of what looked like contrails and began taking photos. rounding a curve noticed something rapidly accelerating leaving a long trail so took a few more pictures, switched to videoing it until it disappeared and went back to taking photos of its poofed out puffs leaving several odd clouds.

later, gradually enlarging the photos i could see a triangular tip, followed by a short silver cylinder section expelling / creating the trail. 

what was really interesting is that as i further enlarged the photos and videos the plume remained focused but the object itself became a pixelated square.

as if something was changing the presentation my samsung s7 cell phone camera was presenting.

at first i thought it might have been an aircraft, but there was none. and it was moving incredible fast for something that could be 50 to 100 miles away. possibly several thousand miles an hour.

fortunately the photos & videos had land marks to measure transit angles over time, elevations and the object was well light by the setting sun


because the object was back lighted from underneath by the setting sun it was obviously solid and very high up in the sky.

thought is possibly could be a missle.
heading nne.

or something re-entering our atmosphere.

but when it poofed out, it left me wondering if it was a huge chunk of ice that eventually vaporized.

or was it something that sensed my photographing it and decided to disappear.

i'm sure a spectral analysis of the trail, the silver white traingle, the silver cylinder section and the enlarged pixelated square tip could help understand what it was.

i hope i've attatched the video's.
content.summary: Driving west on route 1, noticed contrail like clouds, began taking photos. then video of rapidly moving object and more photos. gradual enlarging of photos showed triangular object, short silver tube creating focused  exhaust trail but pixelated square t

content.detailedDescription:
Me and 3 of my friends were bored so we decided to just go up in the woods and walk around. we went up to cossit heights in sydney where people illegally dump garbage and stuff like that, it's pretty isolated. any way we got bored of walking around and decided to throw snowballs at each other and when we started carrying on we saw this thing rise up out of the woods probably 150 to 200 feet away. it had 2 lights on the front of it was square ish in shape and was a metallic grey colour. it made no noise and hovered over top of us and at which point we all stopped and walked to the middle of the dead end road and it came right over us mid daylight about 100 feet or so in the air and zipped straight up into the sky in the blink of an eye. we freaked out and ran down to the jr high school and ran in yelling we saw something but the people there looked at us like we were crazy. we ran to my buddies house down the road and told his parents but they dismissed it saying we were drinking or whatever but we weren't. 

years later i told one of my best friends about the story and after describing the object he told me his girlfriend at the time saw the same thing hovering over someone else's house out in new waterford i think it was. at which point she said the object also zipped up straight into the sky.
content.summary: We saw something rise up from the woods and fly into the air

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving back from ft collins to longmont after spending the day w our relator looking for houses. we were on 287 and we both saw it at the same time. we were between ft collins and loveland  up in the sky a ciger shaped light coming toward the ground in the south.  just for a few seconds and then it had a tail of lights and disappeared husband kept driving and we were both like did you just see that?  he thought it was going to crash i thought it was a metoer it took my breath away.  there were no planes in sight it was a clear summer night    no clouds
content.summary: Bright lights across sky and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It was a friend that took this photo in 2026 here in the highlands if scotland he only realised this object was there after studying the photo after
content.summary: My friend took the photo but didn't see the object when doing so

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to play basketball with my son. while he went to invite our naborto play with us, i saw what i thaught was a possible aircraft. soon after i first observed the object a second one appeared. the two objects moved across the sky maintaining the same speed and distance untill the objects stopped in the north east sky wear they appear to increas in altitude until out of sight. during the time me my kids and naybors watched this a orange and white jet air craft flew what looked like a pattern around the objects. i do live close to an airport but it is not big enough for many jets to take off from. we attempted to look at the objects through a small telescope, looked like round, blue fire balls with red and green rings around them. from the ground with no optics the looked crome or silver. i only got one decent picture, with my cell phone camera.
content.summary: Two round objects appeared in tree line above my house maintained exact spped and distance travelling east north east then appeared to rapidly gain altitude until out of sighti

content.detailedDescription: We were outside on our back deck talking when we noticed a big dog like cloud that emerged from behind the tree line then a huge gust of wind that blew the fog away. she noticed the bright colorful object flickering in the sky. we just thought it was just a couple of planes at night. the objects flickered lights and were hovering and bouncing around. we felt amazed  and in awe that we might have actually seen real ufo's. we finally lost sight when we went to bed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We noticed 2 bright objects in the air that looked like sparklers that were multi colored and had rays shooting out and spinning

content.detailedDescription: We were outside on our back deck talking when we noticed a big dog like cloud that emerged from behind the tree line then a huge gust of wind that blew the fog away. she noticed the bright colorful object flickering in the sky. we just thought it was just a couple of planes at night. the objects flickered lights and were hovering and bouncing around. we felt amazed  and in awe that we might have actually seen real ufo's. we finally lost sight when we went to bed.

content.summary: We noticed 2 bright objects in the air that looked like sparklers that were multi colored and had rays shooting out and spinning

content.detailedDescription: At 10:33 pm i went outside for a cigarette, and observed 2 blinking lights that looked like stars but brighter and flashing. as i kept watching one started to move and gain speed rapidly and a moment later the other one started moving too. they moved really fast and went in a path for a while and then changed direction and i could see the body of the craft was shiny and long. i could see multiple lights on both, which kept very quickly flashing from white to red. it was hard to see them after a minute because of how high up they were going and how fast, but i could see the moon reflecting off the craft when it flew past it. it was going so fast it looked like it was leaving a trail. eventually it flew out of view, but it made no noise. this was not airplanes or helicopters, i have never seen them stop and gain speed like these did. i live in a pretty rural area, and have observed a lot of planes and helicopters but this was not either. i also recorded on my phone but unfortunately it didn't pick up what i was seeing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red and white flashing craft moving at high speeds

content.detailedDescription:
i wish i had been recording during the event. i check the skies almost every night for odd objects out my windows. if i see something interesting, i go outside with my good camera. tonight, i saw a star-like object in the sky that was more like a cigar shape (up and down) rather than round. so i headed out. i was trying to zoom in on this thing and watch it, to see its shape better and also to see if it was moving at all.

   i swear people are going to think i am crazy or something because i have been reporting a lot of activity lately. it is unfortunate to seem insane with what i am about to say but i am very very very serious about ufos and e.T.S. i would never ever report any untrue evidence to take the focus off of real sightings. in my lifetime, i want to see the world come to know the truth. i would never do anything to compromise that. so i guess you will just have to take my word for it.

   while i was zooming into this object on my camera, to the left of me, high tree-top level, the brightest largest thing i have ever seen zoomed over my head super fast. it appeared out of nowhere and was over my head/house in a split second. it had to have been the size of i don't even know, maybe an nba basketball court? it was a giant oval/disc. the entire thing was glowing super bright white and had a gigantic tail that lasted as long as the object itself did. it was so bright, that it lit up my hands and some objects in the area, like the shiny posts on my back porch and the fencing in the back yard.

   i was so freaked and surprised by this, i jumped up from a kneeling position and exclaimed "holy ****!". my next-door neighbors homes, on each side, are within 15 feet of my home. they had to have heard me. the first thing i thought to do was look around and listen. i heard someone next-door, or possibly a couple doors down talking quietly. my immediate reaction was to listen to if they saw it too. someone had to have seen this!!! it was so fast, if they weren't looking up at that exact time, they wouldn't have.

   what i found most eerie about this sighting is that everything was absolutely silent besides for the crickets. when you see objects high up in the sky that are silent, which is what i have always seen, i guess you assume they are far away, so if they do make any noise, maybe you just can't hear it. but when something that large, bright, fast and right there, right at tree-top level is silent!!!!????... that gave me chills and my heart dropped to my stomach. this is the type of thing i thought would never in a million years happen to me. the type of thing i would only wish of experiencing.

   about a minute and a half later, a helicopter flew over my house in the direction the object had been heading. however, i live in a major city. there are helicopters flying over daily. i do want to mention that. i do not want anyone to assume a helicopter is a for sure sign of something near where i live because it is not. but usually, they are headed toward the direction of our highways and are during rush hour on weekdays, to report traffic. it was about 20 minutes ago, at 10:30pm on a saturday night. 

   also, when i see an object near my home, i always wonder if they have a particular interest in the area because of the airport, nasa research center and a bomber plant built in 1942 all not too far away. oddly, this object, had it continued zooming in the exact direction it was, would have passed right over these places.
content.summary: Crazy large fast glowing object

content.detailedDescription:
1.Outside in backyard getting ready to grill dinner.
2. bright orange light.
3. helicopter with spotlight
4.See above in short description
5.Creeped out
6.The light it emitted slowly faded to nothing at all.
content.summary: Bright orange orb, north of me headed west, looked to be traveling at 150-250 knots, no altitude change, straight flight path, immediately faded to nothing 3 seconds after observing it.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the end of my street with my dog on the least, i then went to change the song on my phone to something else. i was changing my song when i looked up as i was stretching a saw a huge beam of light shoot past me. the object when i first saw it was to me a ufo most likely. the object was moving very fast, and now looking back most likely was heading in a north diagonal direction, northwest basically. it also sped past me very quickly, like i only saw this for two seconds and it was flying or moving, whatever you would call that at least 2000 ft as it seemed very close to the ground. its motions are the only thing i can recall and it moved very quickly, almost as if i spotted it in the sky when i looked up. my feelings during it were terryfied and paranoid, making it to me, a ufo or a spacecraft moving at fast speeds. what really set it in stone was when i texted a friend about it, he said he saw the exact same thing and he was in florida and also ssaid it was heading north. after i saw it i became paranoid and ran up the street with my dog in my arms and locked the doors in my house a got a knife to hold to feel much safer. i would like to say i'm filing this report about 50 minutes after the event.
content.summary: Light beam, very fast and visible for a second.

A flash light ascending up fro se to nw like from boston to alaska ascending light which cover the sky for a second like a flash so  was a body at thew light speed crossing the sky , no sound and even didn't blow up as a meteor got on the atmosphere,

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 5:00 pm saturday 9/30/17 i looked up into a nearly cloudless sky and saw a bright white/silver sphere that appeared approximately 5 times larger than a typical star. for about 10 minutes the object was stationary. i retrieved a set of binoculars and steadied them against a fence post. the object then appeared to be translucent around the inside with a small solid dot white dot in the center. as i watched the object it began slowly moving in a north easterly direction. when first sighted the object was stationary but when it began to move it very gradually did so and then began moving a little faster. i viewed the object for about ten minutes and it was stationary. when it began moving i estimated the time that it would disappear behind the trees to be about another 10 to 15 minutes. had the movement of the object remained the same my estimated time frame would have been correct. due to the nearly imperceptible increase in speed the object moved out of sight behind the trees. i have seen stars in both the night and day sky, with and without cloud cover. this object was larger, brighter and moved differently than any other stars i have witnessed. a high flying passenger aircraft flew through the sky while the object was visible and it was easily distinguishable as a common man made aircraft. the object i viewed today was neither a man made aircraft nor a bright planet that is often seen in the daytime sky. there was no possible way that i mistook the moon to be the object i witnessed.
content.summary: Bright silver sphere larger than a planet viewed in bright daylight. observed through binoculars, object appeared transluscent in the center. moved slowly n/e.

content.detailedDescription:
Early friday evening the 15th sept. 2017 i was observing a rainbow through the window of my hotel room on the 13th floor. as a pro photographer and photojournalist i thought it would make a nice picture.
i grabbed my camera and pressed the lens against the window and took the first shot at 70mm. i then changed the focal length to 16mm and took another couple of shots with the camera in the same position.
for security reasons the window could not be opened, only tilted. it remained fully closed during  this procedure.

i didn't notice the two objects at the time i was taking the pictures as i was concentrating on my subject, the rainbow through the eye  level view finder.
it was only after i returned home and uploaded them to my computer that i saw what i had captured that evening.

i don't really know if what i captured was a ufo or just reflections from somewhere. i don't think they were reflections from the glazing as i had the camera lens pressed hard against the glass.

i have attached the raw image files that contain all the info you may need including a time stamp for each image,

my location at the time was the marriott world congress hotel, 53113 bonn, germany
content.summary: Two unidentifiable objects visible north east of my hotel in bonn

content.detailedDescription: Look please!!!!
content.summary: Teleport at my home

content.detailedDescription:
Yes it is. i saw the same lights twice once in hawaii and once in arizona. 
in arizona i also saw three orbs out side my window?
content.summary: I saw this flying in a stragiht line at about 4000 miles per hour. there were two another in arizona.
